trans-unit.source: Represents a row in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma linha num <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The DataGridViewRow class represents a row in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: A classe de DataGridViewRow representa uma linha num <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve rows through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedRows%2A> collections of the control.
trans-unit.target: Pode obter linhas através de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedRows%2A>coleções do controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedRows%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>

trans-unit.source: Unlike a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>, a DataGridViewRow physically contains a collection of all of the cells in that row.
trans-unit.target: Ao contrário de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>, um DataGridViewRow fisicamente contém uma coleção de todas as células nessa linha.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>

trans-unit.source: You can access this collection through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Cells%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Pode aceder a esta coleção através de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Cells%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Cells%2A>

trans-unit.source: The DataGridViewRow class is used to access the individual cell elements, as well as to adjust the appearance and behavior of the row user interface (UI), such as height and cell style.
trans-unit.target: A classe de DataGridViewRow é utilizada para aceder os elementos de célula individuais, bem como para ajustar o aspeto e o comportamento de interface de utilizador (IU), de linha, tais como o estilo de altura e célula.

trans-unit.source: Typically, you will want all rows or most rows in the control to share the same characteristics.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, deverá todas as linhas ou mais linhas no controlo para partilhar as mesmas características.

trans-unit.source: To set cell styles for all rows in the control, set the properties of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Para configurar os estilos de célula para todas as linhas no controlo, definir as propriedades do objeto devolvido pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To set styles for alternating rows, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Para definir os estilos de linhas alternadas, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information about cell styles, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre os estilos de célula, consulte [estilos de célula no controlo Windows Forms DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to define a row that will be used as a basis for all rows added to the control.
trans-unit.target: Também pode utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade para definir uma linha que será utilizada como base para todas as linhas adicionadas ao controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control will share DataGridViewRow objects across multiple data rows whenever possible to avoid performance penalties.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo vai partilhar DataGridViewRow objetos em várias linhas de dados sempre que possível, para evitar penalidades no desempenho.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Unless you are working with large amounts of data and experiencing performance issues, you can typically ignore row sharing.
trans-unit.target: Exceto se estiver a trabalhar com grandes quantidades de dados e com problemas de desempenho, normalmente, pode ignorar a partilha de linha.

trans-unit.source: A shared row is indicated by an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Index%2A> property value of -1.
trans-unit.target: Uma linha partilhada é indicada por uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Index%2A>valor da propriedade de -1.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Index%2A>

trans-unit.source: Some members of the DataGridViewRow class cannot be used with shared rows, but you can unshare a row by accessing it through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Item%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Alguns membros da classe DataGridViewRow não podem ser utilizados com linhas partilhadas, mas pode unshare uma linha acedendo-lo a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Item%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Item%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Rows can also become unshared in other ways.
trans-unit.target: Também podem ficar sem de outras formas linhas.

trans-unit.source: To access a row without unsharing it, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.SharedRow%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Para aceder a uma linha sem unsharing-lo, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.SharedRow%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.SharedRow%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When working with large amounts of data, you should be aware of how rows are shared and unshared to avoid performance penalties.
trans-unit.target: Ao trabalhar com grandes quantidades de dados, deve estar ciente de como as linhas são partilhadas e partilhadas para evitar penalidades no desempenho.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [melhores práticas para o dimensionamento do controlo Windows Forms para DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref> class without using a template.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref> classe sem utilizar um modelo.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the row in its blank state.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor inicializa a linha no Estado em branco.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject> assigned to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject>atribuído para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject>

trans-unit.source: To control the instance returned from this method, override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para controlar a instância devolvida por este método, substitua o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A>

trans-unit.source: If no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> is currently assigned to the control, a new instance of one is created.
trans-unit.target: Se não <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>está atualmente atribuído ao controlo, é criada uma nova instância de um.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To get or set the AccessibilityObject property, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Obter ou definir a propriedade AccessibilityObject, tem de adicionar uma referência para o `Accessibility` assemblagem instalada com o [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: For more information about accessible objects, see the "Active Accessibility" section of the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre objetos acessíveis, consulte a secção "Active Directory acessibilidade" biblioteca do MSDN em [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject> assigned to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject>atribuído para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject>

trans-unit.source: Modifies an input row header border style according to the specified criteria.
trans-unit.target: Modifica um estilo de limite de cabeçalho de linha de entrada, de acordo com os critérios especificados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control internally calls the AdjustRowHeaderBorderStyle method to determine the appearance of the borders for the row header cells.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo internamente chama o método de AdjustRowHeaderBorderStyle para determinar o aspecto dos limites para as células de cabeçalho de linha.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control typically uses the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedRowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> property for the `dataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyleInput` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo normalmente utiliza o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedRowHeadersBorderStyle%2A>propriedade para o `dataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyleInput` parâmetro.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedRowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that represents the row header border style to modify.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref> que representa o estilo de limite de cabeçalho de linha para modificar.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that is used to store intermediate changes to the row header border style.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref> que é utilizado para armazenar alterações intermédias para o estilo de limite de cabeçalho de linha.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to add a single vertical border to the result; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para adicionar um único limite vertical para o resultado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to add a single horizontal border to the result; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para adicionar um único limite horizontal para o resultado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the row is the first row displayed in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a linha é apresentada na primeira linha a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the row is the last row in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that has its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Visible*> property set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a linha é a última linha no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> que tenha o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Visible*>propriedade definida como <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Visible*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that represents the new border style used.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref> que representa o novo estilo do limite utilizado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of cells that populate the row.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de células que povoa a linha.

trans-unit.source: If the row does not contain any cells when this property is accessed, a new empty <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection> will be created by a call to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.CreateCellsInstance%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se a linha não contém quaisquer células quando aceder a esta propriedade, um novo vazio <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection>será criada por uma chamada para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.CreateCellsInstance%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.CreateCellsInstance%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection"></xref> that contains all of the cells in the row.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection"> </xref> que contém todas as células na linha.

trans-unit.source: Creates an exact copy of this row.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia exata desta linha.

trans-unit.source: The Clone method copies the row and its property values, but does not copy the cell values that the row contains.
trans-unit.target: O método de clonagem copia a linha e os respetivos valores de propriedade, mas não copiar os valores de célula que contém a linha.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to copy cell values when cloning a row, see the example section.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como copiar os valores ao clonar uma linha, consulte a secção de exemplo.

trans-unit.source: Override the Clone method whenever you derive from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> and add new properties to the derived class.
trans-unit.target: Substitua o método de Clone sempre que derivar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>e adicione novas propriedades à classe derivada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the cloned <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que representa o clonado <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the shortcut menu for the row.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o menu de atalho para a linha.

trans-unit.source: This property indicates the shortcut menu that is displayed when the user right-clicks the row unless the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event or the row ContextMenuStrip property overrides the shortcut menu for the specific cell that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade indica o menu de atalho apresentada quando o utilizador right-clicks a linha, a menos que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>evento ou a linha propriedade ContextMenuStrip é substitui o menu de atalho para a célula específica que foi clicado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is set or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`, getting the value of the ContextMenuStrip property raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event of the control and returns the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property as specified in the event handler.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>propriedade está definida ou o respetivo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>propriedade é `true`, obter o valor da gera de propriedade ContextMenuStrip é o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>eventos do controlo e devolve o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade como de eventos especificado processador.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If there are no handlers for the event, getting the value of the ContextMenuStrip property returns the previously specified value or its default value of `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se não houver nenhuma processadores para o evento, obter o valor da propriedade ContextMenuStrip é devolve o valor especificado anteriormente ou o valor predefinido de `null`.

trans-unit.source: Handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event is primarily useful when working with large amounts of data to avoid performance penalties when setting the row ContextMenuStrip value for multiple rows.
trans-unit.target: Processar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>evento é principalmente útil ao trabalhar com grandes quantidades de dados para evitar penalidades no desempenho quando definir a valor de ContextMenuStrip é para várias linhas de linha.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [melhores práticas para o dimensionamento do controlo Windows Forms para DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Changing this property raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripChanged> event on the owning <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, if one exists.
trans-unit.target: A alteração desta propriedade gera o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripChanged>evento o proprietário <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, se existir.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripChanged>

trans-unit.source: If the current row is shared, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.GetContextMenuStrip%2A> method rather than getting the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: Se a linha atual for partilhada, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.GetContextMenuStrip%2A>método em vez de obter o valor desta propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.GetContextMenuStrip%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref> associated with the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"> </xref> associado atual <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When getting the value of this property, the row is in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control and is a shared row.
trans-unit.target: Obter o valor desta propriedade, a linha está a ser um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controlar e é uma linha partilhada.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new accessible object for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cria um novo objeto acessível para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If you do not explicitly call the CreateAccessibilityInstance method, it will be called when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.AccessibilityObject%2A> property is referenced.
trans-unit.target: Se não chame o método CreateAccessibilityInstance explicitamente, este será chamado quando a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.AccessibilityObject%2A>propriedade é referenciada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.AccessibilityObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To get or set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.AccessibilityObject%2A>, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Obter ou definir <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.AccessibilityObject%2A>, tem de adicionar uma referência para o `Accessibility` assemblagem instalada com o [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.AccessibilityObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: A new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject>

trans-unit.source: Clears the existing cells and sets their template according to the supplied <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> template.
trans-unit.target: Limpa as células existentes e define o seu modelo, de acordo com o fornecido <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> modelo.

trans-unit.source: This method clears the row's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection> and reinitializes it with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property of each column of the `dataGridView` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Este método limpa a linha <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection>e reinicializa-o com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.CellTemplate%2A>propriedade de cada coluna do `dataGridView` parâmetro.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection>

trans-unit.source: As a result, the row adopts the appearance and behavior of a row from the `dataGridView` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Como resultado, a linha adopts o aspeto e o comportamento de uma linha do `dataGridView` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that acts as a template for cell styles.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> que age como um modelo para os estilos de célula.

trans-unit.source: dataGridView is .
trans-unit.target: dataGridViewis .

trans-unit.source: A row that already belongs to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> was added.
trans-unit.target: Uma linha que já pertença ao <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> foi adicionado.

trans-unit.source: -or- A column that has no cell template was added.
trans-unit.target: - ou - foi adicionada uma coluna que não tem nenhum modelo de célula.

trans-unit.source: Clears the existing cells and sets their template and values.
trans-unit.target: Limpa as células existentes e define o seu modelo e valores.

trans-unit.source: This method clears the row's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection> and reinitializes it with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property of each column of the `dataGridView` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Este método limpa a linha <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection>e reinicializa-o com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.CellTemplate%2A>propriedade de cada coluna do `dataGridView` parâmetro.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection>

trans-unit.source: As a result, the row adopts the appearance and behavior of a row from the `dataGridView` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Como resultado, a linha adopts o aspeto e o comportamento de uma linha do `dataGridView` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: If there are more elements in the `values` array than cells to be initialized, the extra elements will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: Se não existirem mais elementos a `values` matriz de células a ser inicializado, os elementos adicionais serão ignorados.

trans-unit.source: If there are fewer elements than required, the remaining unmatched cells will retain their default initial values.
trans-unit.target: Se existirem menos elementos necessários, as células sem correspondência restantes irão reter os valores inicial predefinido.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that acts as a template for cell styles.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> que age como um modelo para os estilos de célula.

trans-unit.source: An array of objects that initialize the reset cells.

trans-unit.target: Obtém o objeto de dados vinculados preenchida a linha.

trans-unit.source: Accessing data-bound objects directly through row objects is useful when you do not have direct access to the data source containing the objects.
trans-unit.target: Aceder aos objetos vinculados a dados diretamente através de objetos de linha é útil quando não tiver acesso direto à origem de dados que contém os objetos.

trans-unit.source: It is also convenient when you want to manipulate objects bound to selected rows or to rows passed as arguments to event handlers.
trans-unit.target: Também é conveniente quando pretender manipular objetos vinculados às linhas selecionadas ou para linhas transmitidas como argumentos para processadores de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default styles for the row, which are used to render cells in the row unless the styles are overridden.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define os estilos predefinidos para a linha, que são utilizados para composição células na linha, exceto se os estilos são substituídos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control displays its cells using the styles indicated by the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> property, which inherits styles from other properties of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo mostra as células utilizando estilos indicados pela <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A>propriedade, que herda estilos de outras propriedades do tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> célula</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: For cells in this row, the styles specified through the DefaultCellStyle property override the styles specified through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties, but are overridden by the styles specified through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Para células nesta linha, os estilos especificados através da propriedade DefaultCellStyle é substituem os estilos especificados através do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>Propriedades, mas são substituídas pelos estilos especificados através de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.target: O contorno adicional não expande a área na qual, os utilizadores podem fazer duplo clique para redimensionar automaticamente uma linha.

trans-unit.target: Utilize esta propriedade para fornecer uma mensagem de erro para erros ao nível da linha.

trans-unit.source: The specified message is displayed in a ToolTip when the user moves the mouse pointer over the error icon shown in the row header.
trans-unit.target: É apresentada a mensagem especificada numa descrição, quando o utilizador move o ponteiro do rato sobre o ícone de erro apresentado no cabeçalho de linha.

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework 4.5.2, the error icon is resized according to the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry: ``` <appSettings> <add key="EnableWindowsFormsHighDpiAutoResizing" value="true" /> </appSettings> ``` If this row is associated with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, setting this property will raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: A partir do .NET Framework 4.5.2, o ícone de erro é redimensionado, de acordo com a definição do sistema DPI quando o ficheiro App. config contém a seguinte entrada: ``` <appSettings> <add key="EnableWindowsFormsHighDpiAutoResizing" value="true" /> </appSettings> ``` se associados a esta linha uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo, a definição desta propriedade irá elevar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextChanged>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Calculates the ideal height of the specified row based on the specified criteria.
trans-unit.target: Calcula a altura ideal da linha especificada com base nos critérios especificados.

trans-unit.source: This property is used by the content-based automatic sizing feature of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control to determine the ideal height of a row.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é utilizada pela funcionalidade baseada no conteúdo dimensionamento automático do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo para determinar a altura de uma linha ideal.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The `rowIndex` value lets you specify the actual row index of a shared row.
trans-unit.target: O `rowIndex` valor permite-lhe especificar o índice de linha real de uma linha partilhada.

trans-unit.source: (Shared rows have <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Index%2A> property values of -1.) A `fixedWidth` parameter value of `false` calculates the row height based on calculated column widths that will achieve ideal cell height-to-width ratios.
trans-unit.target: (Linhas partilhadas têm <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Index%2A>valores de propriedade de -1.)</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Index%2A> A `fixedWidth` valor do parâmetro `false` calcula a altura de linha com base no larguras de coluna calculada que irão obter rácios de altura a largura da célula ideal.

trans-unit.source: For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>.
trans-unit.target: Para o conteúdo da célula moldar em várias linhas, o estilo de célula em vigor para a célula tem de ter um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>valor da propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>

trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o dimensionamento automático, consulte [opções de dimensionamento no controlo Windows Forms DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Shared rows have <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Index%2A> values of -1, which prevents you from using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.State%2A> property with shared rows.

trans-unit.source: To use this method, pass in the actual row index.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"></xref> values indicating the row state.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"> </xref> que indica o estado da linha de valores.

trans-unit.source: The row has been added to a control, but the rowIndex value is not in the valid range of 0 to the number of rows in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: A linha foi adicionada a um controlo, mas o rowIndex valor não está no intervalo válido de 0 para o número de linhas no controlo menos 1.

trans-unit.source: The row is not a shared row, but the rowIndex value does not match the row's property value. -or- The row has not been added to a control, but the rowIndex value does not match the row's property value.
trans-unit.target: A linha não é uma linha partilhada, mas o rowIndex valor não corresponde a linha <> *> valor da propriedade. - ou - a linha não foi adicionada a um controlo, mas o rowIndex valor não corresponde a linha <> *> valor da propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the row's header cell.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a célula do cabeçalho da linha.

trans-unit.source: The header cell of a row is typically used to display a row label.
trans-unit.target: A célula de cabeçalho de uma linha é normalmente utilizada para apresentar uma etiqueta de linha.

trans-unit.source: Users can also click the row header to select the row if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Os utilizadores também podem clicar no cabeçalho da linha para selecionar a linha se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>for definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell"></xref> that represents the header cell of row.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell"> </xref> que representa a célula de cabeçalho de linha.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current height of the row.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a altura actual da linha.

trans-unit.source: To set the minimum height for a row, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.MinimumHeight%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para definir a altura mínima para uma linha, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.MinimumHeight%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.MinimumHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of the row.
trans-unit.target: A altura, em pixels, da linha.

trans-unit.source: The default is the height of the default font plus 9 pixels.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é a altura do tipo de letra o predefinição mais 9 pixéis.

trans-unit.source: When setting this property, the row is in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control and is a shared row.
trans-unit.target: Quando definir esta propriedade, a linha está a ser um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controlar e é uma linha partilhada.

trans-unit.source: Gets the cell style in effect for the row.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estilo de célula em vigor para a linha.

trans-unit.source: This property is useful to determine which cell styles are applied to all cells in a row regardless of any column styles that are also applied to the cells.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é útil para determinar os estilos de célula são aplicados a todas as células numa linha independentemente de quaisquer estilos de coluna que também são aplicadas para as células.

trans-unit.source: The row InheritedStyle property inherits its values from the following properties: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DefaultCellStyle%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> (for rows with odd index number) - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> For more information about cell style inheritance, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: A linha InheritedStyle propriedade herda os respetivos valores das seguintes propriedades:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DefaultCellStyle%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>(para linhas com número ímpar de índice) - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>para obter mais informações sobre a herança de estilo de célula, consulte [estilos de célula no controlo Windows Forms DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DefaultCellStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> that specifies the formatting and style information for the cells in the row.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> que especifica as informações de formatação e o estilo das células na linha.

trans-unit.source: The row is in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control and is a shared row.
trans-unit.target: A linha está a ser um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controlar e é uma linha partilhada.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the row is the row for new records.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a linha é a linha para novos registos.

trans-unit.source: Because the row for new records is in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> collection, use the IsNewRow property to determine whether a row is the row for new records or is a populated row.
trans-unit.target: Porque a linha para novos registos está a ser o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>coleção, utilize a propriedade IsNewRow para determinar se uma linha é a linha para novos registos ou uma linha povoada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>

trans-unit.source: A row stops being the new row when data entry into the row begins.
trans-unit.target: Uma linha para a nova linha quando a entrada de dados para a linha começa.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the row is the last row in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>, which is used for the entry of a new row of data; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a linha é a última linha no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>, que é utilizado para a entrada de uma nova linha de dados; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum height of the row.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a altura mínima da linha.

trans-unit.source: The MinimumHeight property maintains the display of the row by setting a limit to how far the user can resize the row's height through the user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: A propriedade MinimumHeight mantém a apresentação da linha ao definir um limite para o utilizador pode redimensionar a altura da linha através da interface de utilizador (IU).

trans-unit.source: The minimum row height in pixels, ranging from 2 to <xref:System.Int32?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: A altura mínima de linhas em pixels, entre 2 a <xref:System.Int32?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: The default is 3.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é 3.

trans-unit.source: When setting this property, the row is in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control and is a shared row.
trans-unit.target: Quando definir esta propriedade, a linha está a ser um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controlar e é uma linha partilhada.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is less than 2.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado quando definir esta propriedade é inferior a 2.

trans-unit.target: Desenha a linha atual.

trans-unit.source: If a handler for the event does not set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true`, this method also calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.PaintHeader%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.PaintCells%2A> methods and raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint?displayProperty=fullName> event.

trans-unit.source: You cannot use this property with a shared row.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível utilizar esta propriedade com uma linha partilhada.

trans-unit.source: For more information about shared rows, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre linhas partilhadas, consulte [melhores práticas para o dimensionamento do controlo Windows Forms para DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: If the Resizable property is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>, the user will not be able to manually adjust the row height.
trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade redimensionável for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>, o utilizador não poderá manualmente ajustar a altura de linha.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>

trans-unit.source: By default, the Resizable property value is based on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToResizeRows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property value.
trans-unit.target: Por predefinição, o valor da propriedade redimensionável baseia-se no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToResizeRows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>valor da propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToResizeRows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If you explicitly set Resizable to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>, however, the control value is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Se definir explicitamente Resizable para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>, no entanto, o valor do controlo é ignorado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>

trans-unit.source: Set Resizable to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState> to restore the value-inheritance behavior.
trans-unit.target: Definir Resizable <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>para restaurar o comportamento de herança de valor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState> restores the value inheritance, the Resizable property will never return a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState> value unless the row has not been added to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Porque <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>restaura a herança de valor, a propriedade redimensionável nunca irá devolver um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>valor, a menos que a linha não foi adicionada a um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>

trans-unit.source: If you need to determine whether the Resizable property value of a row is inherited or has been specified explicitly, check its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.State%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se precisar de determinar se o valor da propriedade redimensionável de uma linha é herdado ou foi especificado explicitamente, verifique o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.State%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.State%2A> value includes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates> flag, the Resizable property value is not inherited.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.State%2A>valor inclui o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates>sinalizador, o valor da propriedade redimensionável não é herdada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState"></xref> value that indicates whether the row can be resized or whether it can be resized only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToResizeRows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState"> </xref> valor que indica se a linha pode ser redimensionada ou se podem ser redimensionado apenas quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToResizeRows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> propriedade está definida como <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The row is in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control and is a shared row.
trans-unit.target: A linha está a ser um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controlar e é uma linha partilhada.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the row is selected.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a linha é selecionada.

trans-unit.source: You cannot use this property with a shared row.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível utilizar esta propriedade com uma linha partilhada.

trans-unit.source: For more information about shared rows, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre linhas partilhadas, consulte [melhores práticas para o dimensionamento do controlo Windows Forms para DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the row is selected; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a linha é selecionada; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The row is in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control and is a shared row.
trans-unit.target: A linha está a ser um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controlar e é uma linha partilhada.

trans-unit.source: Sets the values of the row's cells.
trans-unit.target: Define os valores das células de linha.

trans-unit.source: The `values` parameter represents a variable number of arguments used to populate cell values in the row.
trans-unit.target: O `values` parâmetro representa um número de argumentos utilizada para preencher valores de célula na linha da variável.

trans-unit.source: These values can be passed to this method as multiple, individual arguments or as members of a single <xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: Estes valores podem ser transmitidos a este método, como vários argumentos individuais ou membros de um único <xref:System.Array>.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: Because the values are expected to be instances of type <xref:System.Object>, however, if you pass in an array of value-type values (such as <xref:System.Int32> values), this method will treat the array as a single object and assign it to a single cell.
trans-unit.target: Porque os valores são esperados para instâncias do tipo <xref:System.Object>, no entanto, se passa uma matriz de valores do tipo de valor (tais como <xref:System.Int32>valores), este método irá tratar a matriz como um único objeto e atribua-a uma única célula.</xref:System.Int32> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: To avoid this behavior, you must cast a value-type array to an <xref:System.Object> array or pass in multiple values as multiple arguments.
trans-unit.target: Para evitar este comportamento, tem de o transmitir uma matriz de tipo de valor para um <xref:System.Object>matriz ou passar valores múltiplos como vários argumentos.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: If there are more values in the `values` list than there are cells to be initialized, this method ignores the extra values and returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se não existirem mais valores no `values` lista que existem células ser inicializada, este método ignora os valores adicionais e devolve `false`.

trans-unit.source: This method also returns `false` if any of the specified values cannot be set.
trans-unit.target: Este método devolve também `false` se qualquer um dos valores especificados não pode ser definida.

trans-unit.source: If there are fewer values than there are cells, the remaining unmatched cells retain their current values.
trans-unit.target: Se existirem menos valores que existem células, as células sem correspondência restantes mantém os seus valores atuais.

trans-unit.source: One or more objects that represent the cell values in the row.
trans-unit.target: Um ou mais objetos que representam os valores das células na linha.

trans-unit.source: -or- An <xref:System.Array> of <xref:System.Object> values.
trans-unit.target: - ou - um <xref:System.Array>de <xref:System.Object>valores.</xref:System.Object> </xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if all values have been set; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se todos os valores foram definidos; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: values is .
trans-unit.target: valuesis .

trans-unit.source: This method is called when the associated <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> is operating in virtual mode.
trans-unit.target: Este método é denominado quando associada <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> está a funcionar no modo virtual.

trans-unit.source: -or- This row is a shared row.
trans-unit.target: - ou - esta linha é uma linha partilhada.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current state of the row.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estado atual da linha.

trans-unit.source: You cannot use this property with shared rows because shared rows do not store their state locally.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível utilizar esta propriedade com linhas partilhadas porque linhas partilhadas não armazenar o respetivo estado localmente.

trans-unit.source: To get the state of a shared row, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.GetState%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para obter o estado de uma linha partilhada, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.GetState%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.GetState%2A>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"></xref> values indicating the row state.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"> </xref> que indica o estado da linha de valores.

trans-unit.source: The row is in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control and is a shared row.
trans-unit.target: A linha está a ser um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controlar e é uma linha partilhada.

trans-unit.source: Gets a human-readable string that describes the row.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma cadeia legível por humanos que descreve a linha.

trans-unit.source: This overridden version of the ToString method supplies the class name and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Index%2A> information for this instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> class.
trans-unit.target: Esta versão do método ToString substituída fornece o nome de classe e as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Index%2A>informações para esta instância de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Index%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that describes this row.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que descreve esta linha.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the row is visible.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a linha está visível.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to hide a row from view while keeping the row in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: Utilize esta propriedade para ocultar uma linha da vista enquanto mantém a linha no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: To completely remove a row, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Remove%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Para remover completamente uma linha, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Remove%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Remove%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the row is visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a linha é visível; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The row is in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control and is a shared row.
trans-unit.target: A linha está a ser um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controlar e é uma linha partilhada.
